products.name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser
products.description: 4% benzoyl peroxide foam cleanser with ceramides and niacinamide to help clear acne without disrupting skin barrier
products.how_to_use: Apply to wet skin, massage gently, rinse thoroughly. Use AM and/or PM.

products.name: COSRX Acne Pimple Master Patch
products.description: Hydrocolloid patches that protect blemishes and absorb fluid overnight. Comes in 3 sizes for different pimples.
products.how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin over whitehead. Leave overnight or 8+ hours.

products.name: Paula's Choice 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant
products.description: Cult-favorite 2% salicylic acid liquid exfoliant that unclogs pores, smooths texture, and reduces redness.
products.how_to_use: Apply with cotton pad or fingertips after cleansing, before other treatments. Start 2-3x weekly.

products.name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Medicated Gel Cleanser
products.description: 2% salicylic acid gel cleanser with micro-exfoliating LHA for oily, acne-prone skin. Dermatologist tested.
products.how_to_use: Lather with water, massage onto face, rinse. Use AM and PM.

products.name: COSRX Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence
products.description: 96.3% snail secretion filtrate to hydrate, soothe inflammation, and help fade acne scars and PIH.
products.how_to_use: Apply 2-3 pumps after toner, pat gently. Use AM and PM.

products.name: Differin Adapalene Gel 0.1%
products.description: First FDA-approved OTC retinoid. Prevents and treats acne at the source by regulating cell turnover.
products.how_to_use: Apply pea-sized amount to clean, dry face at night. Start every other night. Use SPF daily.

products.name: PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash 10% Benzoyl Peroxide
products.description: Maximum strength 10% benzoyl peroxide foaming wash for stubborn acne. Kills acne-causing bacteria.
products.how_to_use: Apply to wet skin, leave 1-2 minutes for contact time, rinse. Use daily or every other day.

products.name: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
products.description: High-strength vitamin B3 and zinc to balance sebum production, minimize pores, and reduce blemishes.
products.how_to_use: Apply a few drops AM and/or PM before heavier treatments.

products.name: Youth to the People Superfood Cleanser
products.description: Gentle antioxidant-rich gel cleanser with cold-pressed superfoods. Removes makeup without stripping.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet skin, rinse with warm water. AM and PM.

products.name: Some By Mi AHA BHA PHA 30 Days Miracle Toner
products.description: Triple acid exfoliating toner with tea tree and centella. Targets acne, pores, and uneven texture.
products.how_to_use: Apply with cotton pad after cleansing. Start 2-3x weekly, increase gradually.

products.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel
products.description: Oil-free, non-comedogenic gel moisturizer with hyaluronic acid. Lightweight hydration for acne-prone skin.
products.how_to_use: Apply after serums, AM and PM. Can layer under SPF.

products.name: Herbivore Blue Tansy Resurfacing Clarity Mask
products.description: Natural AHA/BHA and fruit enzyme gel mask to clarify, smooth texture, and calm inflammation.
products.how_to_use: Apply thin layer to clean skin, leave 10-20 mins, rinse. Use 1-2x weekly.

products.name: Skin1004 Madagascar Centella Toning Toner
products.description: Gentle, soothing toner with Madagascar centella to calm inflammation and strengthen skin barrier.
products.how_to_use: Apply with hands or cotton pad after cleansing. Use AM and PM.

products.name: CeraVe Acne Control Gel
products.description: Triple-action acne gel with AHA/BHA blend plus ceramides. Targets and prevents breakouts.
products.how_to_use: Apply thin layer PM after cleansing. Start every other night.

products.name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Clear Skin SPF 60
products.description: Oil-free, mattifying sunscreen specifically for acne-prone skin. Cell-Ox Shield technology.
products.how_to_use: Apply as final step of AM routine. Reapply every 2 hours when exposed to sun.

products.name: Paula's Choice Clinical 1% Retinol Treatment
products.description: High-strength 1% retinol serum with peptides to treat acne, scars, and aging simultaneously.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM 2-3x weekly initially, increase gradually. Always use SPF.

products.name: SkinCeuticals Blemish + Age Defense
products.description: Medical-grade dual-acid serum targeting adult acne and signs of aging. Reduces excess oil and fine lines.
products.how_to_use: Apply 4-5 drops PM after cleansing. Use SPF daily.

products.name: Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial
products.description: 25% AHA + 2% BHA professional-strength peel mask for resurfacing and clearing congestion.
products.how_to_use: Apply to clean skin, leave 20 mins, rinse. Use 1x weekly max.

products.name: Anua Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner
products.description: Calming toner with 77% heartleaf (Houttuynia Cordata) for irritated, acne-prone skin. Soothes and hydrates.
products.how_to_use: Apply with cotton pad or pat with hands after cleansing. AM and PM.

products.name: COSRX BHA Blackhead Power Liquid
products.description: 4% betaine salicylate (gentler BHA) liquid to dissolve blackheads and prevent breakouts.
products.how_to_use: Apply after toner, let absorb before next steps. Start 2-3x weekly.

products.name: EltaMD UV Clear Broad-Spectrum SPF 46
products.description: Dermatologist #1 recommended sunscreen with niacinamide. Oil-free, won't clog pores or cause breakouts.
products.how_to_use: Apply liberally as last skincare step. Reapply every 2 hours.

products.name: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
products.description: Gentle low-pH gel cleanser with tea tree and mild BHA. Maintains skin's acid mantle.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet face, rinse. Ideal for AM cleansing.

products.name: Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel
products.description: Two-step daily peel pads with 7-acid complex. Resurfaces, unclogs pores, and brightens.
products.how_to_use: Use Step 1 pad, wait 2 mins, use Step 2 pad. No rinsing needed.

products.name: Beauty of Joseon Green Plum Refreshing Toner (AHA+BHA)
products.description: Mildly exfoliating toner with AHA+BHA and fermented green plum for gentle resurfacing.
products.how_to_use: Apply after cleansing with cotton pad. Start 2-3x weekly.

products.name: Kate Somerville EradiKate Acne Treatment
products.description: Cult-favorite pink sulfur spot treatment that dries out and shrinks blemishes overnight.
products.how_to_use: Dip Q-tip into pink sediment at bottom, apply to spots PM. Do not shake.

products.name: Klairs Midnight Blue Calming Cream
products.description: Soothing cooling cream with blue guaiazulene (chamomile-derived) to calm irritated acne and redness.
products.how_to_use: Apply as moisturizer or spot treatment on inflamed areas. AM and PM.

products.name: Sunday Riley Good Genes All-In-One Lactic Acid Treatment
products.description: Lactic acid exfoliating serum to brighten, smooth texture, and improve clarity. Reduces acne scars.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM after cleansing. Can be left on or used as mask for 10-15 mins.

products.name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion
products.description: OG pink spot treatment that dries out and heals blemishes overnight. TikTok viral classic.
products.how_to_use: Dip Q-tip into pink sediment, dab on spots before bed. Don't shake bottle.

products.name: Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch Original
products.description: Medical-grade hydrocolloid patches that absorb pimple gunk overnight. Drug-free, gentle.
products.how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin over whitehead. Leave 6+ hours or overnight.

products.name: First Aid Beauty KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub
products.description: 10% AHA chemical + physical exfoliant body scrub for bumpy arms, body acne, and KP.
products.how_to_use: Use on wet skin 2-3x weekly. Massage in circular motions, rinse.

products.name: Murad Rapid Relief Acne Spot Treatment
products.description: Fast-acting invisible spot treatment with 2% salicylic acid. Works within 4 hours.
products.how_to_use: Apply to clean skin on blemishes as needed. Can use under makeup.

products.name: Naturium Niacinamide Serum 12% Plus Zinc 2%
products.description: High-potency 12% niacinamide with zinc to control oil, reduce pores, and calm redness.
products.how_to_use: Apply a few drops AM and/or PM after cleansing.

products.name: Versed Keep The Peace Acne-Calming Cream Cleanser
products.description: Gentle cream cleanser with 0.5% salicylic acid for acne-prone sensitive skin. Non-stripping.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet skin AM and PM, rinse thoroughly.

products.name: Peter Thomas Roth Therapeutic Sulfur Acne Treatment Mask
products.description: 10% sulfur mask that unclogs pores, absorbs oil, and targets acne-causing bacteria.
products.how_to_use: Apply to clean skin, leave 10-15 mins or overnight as spot treatment.

products.name: Isntree Clear Skin 8% AHA Essence
products.description: Gentle 8% AHA essence (glycolic + lactic) to exfoliate, brighten, and improve texture.
products.how_to_use: Apply after toner PM. Start 2-3x weekly, increase as tolerated.

products.name: BY WISHTREND Mandelic Acid 5% Skin Prep Water
products.description: Gentle AHA toner with mandelic acid—the largest AHA molecule for sensitive acne-prone skin.
products.how_to_use: Apply with cotton pad after cleansing. Can use daily.

products.name: CeraVe SA Body Wash for Rough & Bumpy Skin
products.description: Salicylic acid body wash with ceramides to smooth rough, bumpy skin and treat body acne.
products.how_to_use: Use in shower daily. Let product sit for 30-60 seconds before rinsing.

products.name: Paula's Choice Clear Back & Body Acne Spray
products.description: 2% salicylic acid spray for hard-to-reach back and body acne. 360-degree nozzle.
products.how_to_use: Spray on back, chest, shoulders after shower. No rinsing needed.

products.name: Glytone Back & Chest Acne Treatment Spray
products.description: 2% salicylic acid body spray with soothing ingredients. Medical-grade for stubborn bacne.
products.how_to_use: Spray after shower. 360-degree nozzle for easy back application.

products.name: Nécessaire The Body Acne Solution
products.description: Clean body acne serum spray with BHA, niacinamide, and zinc. Targets breakouts and marks.
products.how_to_use: Spray on body after shower. Use up to 3x weekly.

products.name: Tower 28 SOS Daily Rescue Spray
products.description: Hypochlorous acid antimicrobial spray. Kills acne bacteria without irritation. Face and body.
products.how_to_use: Mist onto face or body as needed. Safe for sensitive skin.

products.name: SkinCeuticals Silymarin CF
products.description: First vitamin C serum for oily, acne-prone skin. Reduces oil oxidation, prevents acne, and brightens.
products.how_to_use: Apply 4-5 drops AM after cleansing, before moisturizer and SPF.

products.name: Dr. Dennis Gross DRx SpectraLite FaceWare Pro
products.description: FDA-cleared LED mask combining blue light (kills acne bacteria) and red light (reduces inflammation).
products.how_to_use: Use 3 minutes daily on clean skin. Blue light for acne, red for anti-aging.

products.name: Medik8 Crystal Retinal 6
products.description: Stable retinal (retinaldehyde) serum—11x more potent than retinol. Reduces acne and aging.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM after cleansing. Start every other night. Use SPF daily.

products.name: Drunk Elephant A-Passioni Retinol Cream
products.description: 1% vegan retinol cream with fatty acids and peptides. Reduces acne and fine lines.
products.how_to_use: Apply pea-sized amount PM. Start 2-3x weekly, increase gradually.

products.name: Obagi CLENZIderm M.D. Daily Care Foaming Cleanser
products.description: Medical-grade 2% salicylic acid foaming cleanser. Part of Obagi acne system.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet face, rinse. AM and PM.

products.name: Obagi CLENZIderm M.D. Pore Therapy
products.description: BHA+AHA toning solution to minimize pores and remove excess oil. Medical-grade.
products.how_to_use: Apply with cotton pad after cleansing. AM and PM.

products.name: SkinCeuticals Retinol 0.5
products.description: Medical-grade 0.5% pure retinol in silicone base. For experienced retinol users.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM after cleansing. Use SPF daily.

products.name: SkinCeuticals Retinol 1.0
products.description: Maximum strength 1% pure retinol for advanced users. Professional-grade results.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM after building tolerance to lower strengths.

products.name: iS Clinical Active Serum
products.description: Powerful botanical serum targeting acne, aging, and hyperpigmentation. Dermatologist favorite.
products.how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps PM after cleansing. Can use AM too.

products.name: Acne.org 2.5% Benzoyl Peroxide Treatment
products.description: Research-backed 2.5% BP—as effective as 10% with less irritation. Large tube lasts months.
products.how_to_use: Apply thin layer to entire face PM (or AM and PM). Spot treatment also works.

products.name: Krave Beauty Oat So Simple Water Cream
products.description: Only 9 ingredients. Lightweight, non-comedogenic cream for acne-prone skin rebuilding barrier.
products.how_to_use: Apply as final step AM and PM (before SPF in AM).

products.name: COSRX Green Tea Aqua Soothing Gel Cream
products.description: Lightweight gel cream with green tea and pro vitamin B5. Hydrates without clogging pores.
products.how_to_use: Apply after serums AM and PM.

products.name: Purito Oat-In Calming Gel Cream
products.description: Soothing gel cream with oats and centella. Calms irritated skin without heavy feel.
products.how_to_use: Apply after treatments AM and PM.

products.name: Purito Soft Touch Sunscreen SPF 50+ PA++++
products.description: Lightweight, semi-matte Korean sunscreen for oily skin. No white cast, sets down nicely.
products.how_to_use: Apply as final skincare step AM. Reapply every 2 hours.

products.name: Skin1004 Hyalu-Cica Water-Fit Sun Serum SPF 50+
products.description: Viral watery sun serum. Lightweight, fast-absorbing, no white cast. Great under makeup.
products.how_to_use: Apply generously as final skincare step AM.

products.name: Beauty of Joseon Relief Sun: Rice + Probiotics SPF 50+
products.description: Cult-favorite Korean sunscreen with rice and probiotics. Dewy finish, nourishing feel.
products.how_to_use: Apply as final step AM. Note: may be too rich for very oily skin.

products.name: COSRX Ultra Light Invisible Sunscreen SPF 50
products.description: Truly lightweight sunscreen with minimal ingredients. No white cast, semi-matte finish.
products.how_to_use: Apply as final skincare step AM.

products.name: Haruharu Wonder Black Rice Moisture Cleansing Gel
products.description: Gentle pH-balanced gel cleanser with fermented black rice. Doesn't strip or irritate.
products.how_to_use: Use as second cleanser or AM cleanser. Massage, rinse.

products.name: Banila Co Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
products.description: Oil cleanser for acne-prone skin. Melts makeup and sunscreen, emulsifies cleanly.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto dry face PM. Add water to emulsify, rinse. Follow with water-based cleanser.

products.name: Beauty of Joseon Radiance Cleansing Balm
products.description: Simple, gentle cleansing balm with rice and ginseng. Melts makeup without residue.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto dry face PM. Emulsify with water, rinse. Double cleanse.

products.name: Peach & Lily Glass Skin Refining Serum
products.description: Brightening serum with niacinamide and peach extract for glowing skin without breakouts.
products.how_to_use: Apply after toner AM and PM. Pat gently.

products.name: Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops
products.description: Highlighting serum with niacinamide for glow and pore minimizing. Use alone or mix in.
products.how_to_use: Apply as serum or mix with moisturizer. Use alone as highlighter.

products.name: Topicals Faded Brightening & Clearing Serum
products.description: Powerful serum targeting hyperpigmentation, dark spots, and acne scars. Multi-acid approach.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM to areas of discoloration. Use SPF daily.

products.name: Topicals Like Butter Mist
products.description: Hydrating body mist for bumpy, irritated, eczema-prone skin. Soothing and protective.
products.how_to_use: Mist onto body after shower. Layer under heavier moisturizer if needed.

products.name: VT Reedle Shot 100
products.description: Viral K-beauty serum with silica microneedles. Enhances absorption of other products.
products.how_to_use: Apply after toner PM. Tingling is normal. Follow with other serums.

products.name: Scinic Cicanoid Retinal Cream
products.description: Retinaldehyde cream with centella. Stronger than retinol, gentler than tretinoin.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM after other treatments. Start 2-3x weekly.

products.name: Cos de Baha Azelaic Acid 10% Serum
products.description: Affordable 10% azelaic acid serum. Reduces inflammation, kills bacteria, fades marks.
products.how_to_use: Apply AM and/or PM after cleansing. Safe to use with most actives.

products.name: The Ordinary Azelaic Acid Suspension 10%
products.description: 10% azelaic acid cream-gel for brightness, uneven texture, and blemishes. Very affordable.
products.how_to_use: Apply AM and/or PM. Note: can pill under some products.

products.name: The Ordinary Salicylic Acid 2% Solution
products.description: Simple 2% salicylic acid solution. Affordable BHA for pore clearing.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM after cleansing. Start 2-3x weekly.

products.name: The Ordinary Retinol 0.5% in Squalane
products.description: Moderate-strength retinol in hydrating squalane base. Great for beginners.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM. Start 2x weekly, increase gradually. Use SPF.

products.name: Cocokind Texture Smoothing Cream
products.description: Plant-based moisturizer with niacinamide and bakuchiol to smooth and brighten.
products.how_to_use: Apply AM and PM as moisturizer.

products.name: ZO Skin Health Exfoliating Cleanser
products.description: Medical-grade exfoliating cleanser by Dr. Zein Obagi. Deep cleans and prevents clogging.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet skin AM and PM. Rinse thoroughly.

products.name: ZO Skin Health Complexion Renewal Pads
products.description: Dual-acid exfoliating pads. Removes dead skin, prevents breakouts, smooths texture.
products.how_to_use: Wipe over face PM after cleansing. Start every other night.

products.name: Curology Custom Formula
products.description: Prescription-strength custom formula with derm consultation. Ingredients tailored to your skin.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM as directed by your provider.

products.name: Apostrophe Custom Rx Treatment
products.description: Telederm prescription acne treatment. Oral and topical options available.
products.how_to_use: Use as prescribed by Apostrophe dermatologist.

products.name: Dermalogica Clear Start Clarifying Bacne Spray
products.description: Cooling bacne spray with salicylic acid and tea tree. Treats and prevents body breakouts.
products.how_to_use: Spray on back and chest after shower. 360-degree nozzle.

products.name: Naturium Salicylic Acid Body Spray 2%
products.description: Encapsulated 2% BHA body spray. Gentler release for less irritation.
products.how_to_use: Spray on body after shower. Can use daily.

products.name: Naturium The Smoother Glycolic Acid Body Wash
products.description: Exfoliating body wash with glycolic acid for smooth, clear skin.
products.how_to_use: Use in shower daily. Let sit briefly before rinsing.

products.name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Duo Acne Treatment
products.description: 5.5% micronized benzoyl peroxide treatment that also targets dark marks. Dual action.
products.how_to_use: Apply thin layer to entire face once daily. Start every other day.

products.name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Foaming Cleanser
products.description: Gentle salicylic acid cleanser with soy for even skin tone. Drugstore favorite.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet face, rinse. AM and PM.

products.name: Neutrogena On-The-Spot Acne Treatment
products.description: Classic 2.5% benzoyl peroxide spot treatment. As effective as 10% with less irritation.
products.how_to_use: Apply thin layer to pimples 1-3x daily.

products.name: iNNBEAUTY PROJECT Pimple Paste Overnight Drying Paste
products.description: Pink clay spot treatment with sulfur and salicylic acid. Dries out pimples overnight.
products.how_to_use: Apply to spots PM. Leave overnight, rinse AM.

products.name: Murad Clarifying Body Spray
products.description: Dual-acid body spray targeting body breakouts. Exfoliates and soothes.
products.how_to_use: Spray on body acne areas up to 3x daily.

products.name: Tatcha The Deep Cleanse
products.description: Gentle exfoliating gel cleanser with natural fruit acids. Deep cleans without stripping.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet face, rinse. AM and PM.

products.name: SkinCeuticals LHA Cleansing Gel
products.description: Medical-grade triple-acid cleanser. Decongests pores and smooths texture.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet skin AM and PM, rinse.

products.name: Fenty Skin Fat Water Pore-Refining Toner Serum
products.description: Pore-minimizing toner serum hybrid with niacinamide. Reduces shine and refines pores.
products.how_to_use: Apply after cleansing AM and PM.

products.name: Youth to the People Super Clay Purify + Clear Power Mask
products.description: Triple clay mask with BHA and niacinamide. Deep cleans pores and controls oil.
products.how_to_use: Apply to clean skin, leave 10 mins, rinse. Use 1-2x weekly.

products.name: ROC Retinol Correxion Deep Wrinkle Night Cream
products.description: OG drugstore retinol cream. Proven effective for acne and anti-aging.
products.how_to_use: Apply PM. Start 2-3x weekly. Use SPF daily.

products.name: Kiehl's Calendula Deep Cleansing Foaming Face Wash
products.description: Gentle gel cleanser with calendula petals. Soothes while cleansing.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet face, rinse. AM and PM.

products.name: SkinMedica AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser
products.description: Medical-grade exfoliating cleanser with 4 acids. Smooths texture and clears pores.
products.how_to_use: Use PM. Massage onto wet skin, rinse.

products.name: PCA Skin Acne Gel
products.description: Professional-grade dual-action acne treatment. Clears and prevents breakouts.
products.how_to_use: Apply to affected areas PM. Start every other night.

products.name: PCA Skin BPO 5% Cleanser
products.description: 5% benzoyl peroxide cleanser with added PHA for gentler exfoliation.
products.how_to_use: Massage onto wet skin, let sit 1-2 mins, rinse.

products.name: Anua Niacinamide 10% + TXA 4% Dark Spot Correcting Serum
products.description: Dark spot serum with niacinamide and tranexamic acid. Fades PIH from acne.
products.how_to_use: Apply after toner AM and PM.

products.name: Etude Soon Jung 10 Free Moist Emulsion
products.description: Gentle, minimal-ingredient emulsion for damaged, sensitive skin. Free of 10 common irritants.
products.how_to_use: Apply after serums AM and PM.

products.name: beplain Cicaful Ampoule
products.description: Soothing ampoule with centella to calm irritated, acne-prone skin.
products.how_to_use: Apply after toner AM and PM.

products.name: TIRTIR Ceramic Milk Ampoule
products.description: Barrier-repairing ampoule with ceramides for acne-damaged skin.
products.how_to_use: Apply after toner AM and PM.

products.name: Obagi Professional-C Serum 20%
products.description: Maximum strength 20% L-ascorbic acid serum. Brightens, protects, and reduces scarring.
products.how_to_use: Apply AM after cleansing, before SPF.

products.name: SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic
products.description: Gold-standard vitamin C serum. Brightens, protects from environmental damage, fades scars.
products.how_to_use: Apply 4-5 drops AM after cleansing, before SPF. Note: can be too rich for very oily skin.

products.name: LightStim for Acne
products.description: FDA-cleared blue LED device that kills acne-causing bacteria. Handheld for targeted treatment.
products.how_to_use: Use 3 minutes per area daily on clean skin.

metadata.notes: Comprehensive acne product database v2.0 with 100 products across all budget tiers and beauty philosophies. Includes real affiliate URLs, dermatologist recommendations, detailed ingredient lists, and skin type compatibility. Ready for database import.

schema.name: string - full product name
schema.beauty_philosophy: array - k_beauty, western_clinical, medical_grade, clean, minimalist, vegan, j_beauty
